attributes.action: reduce the cost of passport enquiries to a local call
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to enquire on a landline phone to the government passport help line costs at the present £1.50 a minute on the 0906 110 0664 number. this is a disgraceful cost to a government office  when you can get the same information at 10p for the call duration or by visiting Info.co.uk/Renewal or calling 08719 560 560 is this just another government ripoff to extract even more money from our already shallow pockets? please sign the petition
